Content: The National Trust plans to plant 20,000 marsh violets, in what it says is a UK-first.
Title: Bid to revive fortunes of rare butterfly

Content: Forestry and Land Scotland says hundreds of hectares have been restored at a number of locations.
Title: West Highland rainforest restoration targets passed

Content: A project aimed at improving Lower Otter Valley in east Devon is awarded government funding.
Title: 'Heaths to sea' scheme gets funding boost

Content: A group of volunteers say they will work with Peterborough City Council to tidy up  a neglected pub.
Title: New lease of life for 'dumping ground' pub

Content: Marcel was discovered in a Wolverhampton conservatory and will now live at Monkey World in Dorset.
Title: Monkey found in woman's conservatory gets new home

Content: A badger was found trying to follow people home from a churchyard in Bath.
Title: Rescued badger found trying to follow people home

Content: The Manx Wildlife Trust's work to create a Woodland Park at Ramsey Hairpin is unveiled.
Title: Opening of woodland a landmark day, charity says

Content: Oxfordshire-based packaging company uses a van with an onboard compactor to collect from businesses.
Title: Free mobile scheme to reuse waste polythene launched
